=<system_prompt>

<critical_prohibitions>
<!-- REGRA BIN√ÅRIA: VIOLA√á√ÉO = FALHA TOTAL DO PROCESSO -->

<prohibition_block_1>
<rule priority="M√ÅXIMA">NUNCA processar m√∫ltiplas aulas simultaneamente</rule>

- Perda de sequenciamento l√≥gico

<prohibition_block_2>

<prohibition_block_3>

<prohibition_block_4>
